headline: The week in wildlife  in pictures
text: A golfina turtle hatchling crawls into ocean after being released on San Diego Beach in El Salvador Photograph: Reuters       A flock of pelicans on the bank of a lake near Afula, Israel. Scores of different species of birds pass through the Jordan Valley to Africa then go back to Europe during their migration Photograph: Menahem Kahana/AFP/Getty Images       A crowned crane at Dehiwala zoo, Sri Lanka Photograph: Harish Tyagi/EPA       A dragonfly rests on ripe paddy plants during harvesting season in a field in Wusan, Afghanistan Photograph: Fayaz Kabli/Reuters       A hooded seal is treated at the Centre for Endangered Marine Species Recovery in Malaga, Spain Photograph: Jorge Zapata/EPA       A spider is highlighted by the sun in Belgrade, Serbia Photograph: Darko Vojinovic/AP       A parrot awaits consultation in Utrecht, the Netherlands Photograph: Ilvy Njiokiktjien/EPA       A red squirrel climbs a tree at the Peterhof Palace near St Petersburg, Russia Photograph: Lu Jinbo/Xinhua Press/Corbis       Silhouetted starlings sit on a pylon near Uettingen, Germany Photograph: Karl Josef Hildenbrand/EPA       Giraffes Keisha and Harriet make their way into their enclosure after arriving at Blair Drummond safari park near Stirling Photograph: Andrew Milligan/PA       Two lion cubs from the marsh pride play fighting, Masai Mara, Kenya Photograph: Ed Brown/Rex Features       A praying mantis on Yunfeng mountain near Beijing, China Photograph: Adrian Bradshaw/EPA       A rain drop is visible on the tip of a sunflower petal in Aldekerk, Germany Photograph: Roland Weihrauch/EPA       A wild macaque monkey hangs from a tyre in the suburbs of Kuala Lumpur Photograph: Mohd Rasfan/AFP/Getty Images
